TopicTitle: Don't you just hate it when...

Articles.Content:
...you're in the boardroom, in a meeting with a client, your co-workers and your boss, but your mind is somewhere else. In this case, thinking about your next KSP mission to Duna and how to better design your rocket, making it more stable and efficient. Then your boss turns to you and asks, "So what do you think?" You snap out of it and think, "Oh f*%k" while people are looking at you. You confidently reply, "it makes perfect sense." Your boss nods in agreement.

That happened to me today. I dodged a bullet there. Thanks a lot KSP.
